Specimen Type: Body fluids (e.g., cerebrospinal fluid, pleural fluid, peritoneal fluid, synovial fluid)
Purpose: Quantitative determination of total bilirubin in body fluid specimens to provide accurate, precise, and reproducible results.
Equipment: Benchtop centrifuge; automated biochemistry analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas c 701); calibrated pipettes; vortex mixer
